page.title: 13RISELEY DRAMA GROUP
page.content: Riseley Drama Group was started in l980 and consists mainly of Riseley people. Their productions consist of a revue, 2 old time music hall shows, a Pantomime, 3 one-act plays, 2 full one-act plays and lastly a 3 act farce. These productions were performed for 3 nights on the Village Hall stage and were well received by the audiences. The group is largely self-sufficient in that they make most of their costumes, or borrow from other local groups, and have over the years built up a very large wardrobe. They also design and construct their own sets. Rehearsals are held in the Village Hall once of twice a week for a production, and the group is funded by the Village Hall Committee. All profits go to the Village Hall.
